title: How To Make Sense of iOS User Activity With OpenTelemetry
author: David Rifkin
description: OpenTelemetry can be a powerful tool for observing mobile apps. Using the OTel-Swift SDK, we can trace app activity from disparate parts of an iOS code base.
cntitle: 如何使用 OpenTelemetry 理解 iOS 用户活动
cndescription: OpenTelemetry 可以成为观察移动应用的强大工具。使用 OTel-Swift SDK，我们可以追踪来自 iOS 代码库中不同部分的应用活动。
